page.title: 12Homelife - Part 1
page.content: Standard of home life is good & due to efficient birth control families are well planned & inclined to be small. As many men commute to work, and a high proportion of women work outside the home, several households run two cars. One is often financed by the employer. Where husbands are commuters, wives have responsibility of household. Husbands share care of children, many being with wives during childbirth. Most homes have automatic washing machines, freezers and refrigerators, microwave ovens & dish washers are becoming popular. Cooking is chiefly electric and calor gas, wood burning stoves are also used (more information under ENERGY). Bread & milk are delivered 3 times a week, post and newspapers daily.
